definitions.text: the activity of persuading someone to buy
exchange or deliver for money or its equivalent
examples: He sold his house in January
She sells her body to survive and support her drug habit

definitions.text: be sold at a certain price or in a certain way
examples: These books sell like hot cakes
The French try to sell us their image as great lovers

definitions.text: do business; offer for sale as for one's livelihood
give up for a price or reward
examples: She sold her principles for a successful career

definitions.text: be approved of or gain acceptance
examples: The new idea sold well in certain circles

definitions.text: be responsible for the sale of
examples: All her publicity sold the products

definitions.text: deliver to an enemy by treachery
